element.hint: Provide a clear description for this Transfer Number
element.label: Description
element.name: description

element.hint: Select if a prompt should be played before transferring the call to the external number
element.label: Play Transfer Prompt
element.name: play_transfer_prompt

element.hint: Define a unique identifier for this transfer number
element.label: Transfer ID
element.name: transfer_id

element.hint: If Play Transfer Prompt is set, the caller will be played this prompt prior to call transfer
element.label: Transfer Prompt
element.name: transfer_prompt
